attributes.action: increase support services in the UK for people with Asperger’s Syndrome and other Autistic Spectrum Conditions, their families, schools and employers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are an estimated 133,500 children and 454,400 adults on the autistic spectrum in the UK.

The Autistic Spectrum is the name given to a group of conditions that share three areas of difficulty – social interaction, social communication, and social imagination. It encompasses a wide range of levels of linguistic skill, intelligence and ability.

Asperger's Syndrome is a neurological condition on the autistic spectrum that affects the way a person relates to others. It is characterised by difficulty in social relationships, differences in the way a person experiences and interacts with the world, and a different style of learning and communicating.

Required support services include:

• Practical support for families
• Training and support for schools and teachers
• Assistance in to and within employment
• Positive action to address social isolation and exclusion

government_responses.details:
